title: All Ball - Former Pro Bowl WR TJ Houshmandzadeh Talks Police Profiling, Dropping Out of HS, Oregon St. SQUAD, Ocho, MJ/LeBron
itunes:title: All Ball - Former Pro Bowl WR TJ Houshmandzadeh Talks Police Profiling, Dropping Out of HS, Oregon St. SQUAD, Ocho, MJ/LeBron
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by former NFL Pro Bowl wide receiver TJ Houshmandzadeh discusses his personal experiences with being racially profiled by police, his turbulent upbringing, including dropping out of high school, selling drugs, and making it to the NFL by way of Oregon St. with Chad Ochocinco. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
